Journal.Title: Revista de chirurgie, oncologie, radiologie, o. r. l., oftalmologie, stomatologie. Seria: Stomatologie
Journal.ISOAbbreviation: Rev Chir Oncol Radiol O R L Oftalmol Stomatol Ser Stomatol

Article.ArticleTitle: [Pharmaceutical preparations from plant products employed in stomatologic diseases].

AbstractText: Two preparations for stomatological use have been introduced, obtained from vegetal extracts of Ocimum basilicum L., Tilia sp., and Symphytum officinalis L. Their stability in time was evaluated, and the microbiological activity was assessed in vitro on microbial strains involved in stomatological affections. In clinical experiments good results were obtained in parodonthopathies, in the therapy of lesions developing under prostheses, and in other affections.

Article.VernacularTitle: Preparate farmaceutice din produse vegetale utilizate în afecţiuni stomatologice.

MedlineJournalInfo.MedlineTA: Rev Chir Oncol Radiol O R L Oftalmol Stomatol Ser Stomatol
